casebody.data:
Krawiec, et al.
v.
Manly, et al. 252A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 21, 2016 Nichole M. Hatcher, Attorney at Law, Erin B. Blackwell, Attorney at Law, for Krawiec, Michael et al. *398Renner Jo St. John, Attorney at Law, for Bogosavac, Ranko, et al. H. M. Whitesides, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Manly, Jim, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 19th of July 2016 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of July 2016."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 14th day of November 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
